CustomField.formula: IF( Paid_Status__c = true , HYPERLINK("https://wa.me/+91"& MobilePhone&"?text=Hi%20"& LastName &"%2C%20%0A%0AJust%20wanted%20to%20say%20a%20big%20thank%20you%20for%20registering%20for%20our%20chess%20tournament!%20Your%20participation%20means%20a%20lot%20to%20us%2C%20and%20we%20can%27t%20wait%20to%20see%20you%20on%20May%2025th!%20If%20you%20have%20a%20chess%20mat%2C%20feel%20free%20to%20bring%20it%20along%20for%20added%20comfort.%20%0A%0AYour%20confirmation%20ID%20is%20%5B"& Registration_Id__c&"%5D%20in%20category%20" & IF( ISPICKVAL( Category__c , 'Pro Play - Under 18 (₹199)') , 'Pro Play', 'Fun Play') &" %5D.%20Keep%20it%20handy%20for%20the%20tournament%20day.%20Looking%20forward%20to%20some%20great%20games%20and%20fun%20times%20together!%20%0A%0ABest%20regards%2C%0ASakthi%20Team", "Whatsapp"), HYPERLINK( "https://wa.me/+91" & MobilePhone & "?text=Hello%20" & LastName & "%2C%0A%0A" & "We%20hope%20this%20message%20finds%20you%20well.%0A%0A" & "We%20wanted%20to%20touch%20base%20regarding%20your%20registration%20for%20the%20Sakthi%20Chess%20Tournament.%20" & "It%20seems%20that%20while%20you've%20successfully%20registered%20%5BRegistration%20Id%3A%20" & Registration_Id__c & "%5D%2C%20" & "we%20haven't%20received%20your%20payment%20yet.%0A%0A" & "If%20you%20missed%20the%20payment%20page%2C%20please%20use%20the%20following%20link%20to%20complete%20your%20payment%20" & "for%20the%20"&IF( ISPICKVAL( Category__c , 'Pro Play - Under 18 (₹199)') , 'Pro Play', 'Fun Play')&"%20category%3A%20%5BPayment%20Link%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Frzp.io%2Fl%2F"&IF( ISPICKVAL( Category__c , 'Pro Play - Under 18 (₹199)') , 'proplay', 'funplay')&"%20%5D.%0A%0A" & "Thank%20you%20for%20your%20prompt%20attention%20to%20this%20matter.%0A%0A" & "Best%20regards%2C%0ASakthi%20Team", "Whatsapp" ) )
CustomField.label: Whatsapp
